system.description: When you try to impose your will on your gang, roll+hard.

failure.label: Complications
failure.value: On a miss, someone in your gang makes a bid, idle or serious, to replace you for alpha.

partial.label: Partial Success
partial.value:
On a 7–9, choose 1:

  • They do what you want (otherwise, they refuse)
  • They don’t fight back over it (otherwise, they do fight back)
  • You don’t have to make an example of one of them (otherwise, you must)

success.label: Success
success.value:
On a 10+, all 3.

  • They do what you want (otherwise, they refuse)
  • They don’t fight back over it (otherwise, they do fight back)
  • You don’t have to make an example of one of them (otherwise, you must)
